item.title: Flickr Wall Art is now available worldwide
item.description:
Yahoo has expanded its Flickr wall art service to global markets, enabling businesses worldwide to adorn their walls with photographic artwork from Flickr artists. Initially introduced in October, the Flickr Wall Art service allows the transformation of photographs from licensed artists within the Flickr Marketplace into high-quality wall prints available for purchase directly on Flickr. The Flickr team has curated a collection of licensed photographs from popular categories such as abstract, landscapes, travel, and animals...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/flickr-wall-art-is-now-available-worldwide/
